post:
All services below are provided out of our Atlanta, GA datacentre. For information about upcoming locations [join our flash sales email list here](http://offers.delimiter.com/flashsales/).

**Freebie**

Try Delimiter's ObjSpace (S3-Compatible Object Storage) free for 30 days! Select the 100GB plan (reg. $2.50/mo) and use the coupon code **TRYOBJSPACE** for 1 month free.

Get your [Free Month of ObjSpace Here](https://www.delimiter.com/objspace-object-storage/?woo_campaign=let032116&woo_source=LET&woo_medium=web&woo_content=objspace).

**Cloud VPS (KVM)**

Redundant compute/storage/network. Based on CloudStack. NVMe-acclerated redundant Ceph storage. Internal networking (with multiple VMs), private router/firewall & load balancer included.

Compute nodes connected at: 10GigE - Public Network, 10GigE - Private Network, 40GigE - Storage.

1 CPU  
1GB Ram  
250GB Storage   
1TB Bandwidth (gigabit port)  
1 IPv4 Address  
Private Router/Firewall + Load Balancer  
Order additional resources (CPU/Ram/Storage/IPs) & create multiple VMs, 1 CPU required per VM.  
KVM Virtualisation  

$6/Month

Order Here: [https://www.delimiter.com/ha-cloud-vps/](https://www.delimiter.com/ha-cloud-vps/?woo_campaign=let032116&woo_source=LET&woo_medium=web&woo_content=hacloud)

-----------

**StorageVPS (OpenVZ)**

NVMe-cached ZFS Storage VPS

1 Core/512MB Ram/500GB Storage/2TB Bandwidth/1 IPv4 - $21/Quarter

Order Here: [https://www.delimiter.com/storage-vps/](https://www.delimiter.com/storage-vps/?woo_campaign=let032116&woo_source=LET&woo_medium=web&woo_content=storagevps)

-----------

**Test IP/Files?**

Send me a PM or email sales@delimiter.com. Provide IPs in your request if you'd like me to run a traceroute from Atlanta.

**Delivery Time?**

Each order is manually reviewed (be sure to use correct info, no VPN, etc). Order reviews take up to 1 business day, delivery within 1-3 business days after approval.

**Additional IPs?**

There are options to purchase additional IPs on the order form - either single IPs or subnets.
